name: Speedrun for Light
description:
Speedrun for Light

A 72h pixelart 2D platformer game for the Ludum Dare 51

HOW TO PLAY

You have Every 10 seconds of light to cross each room as fast as possible, but be careful if you lose you have to start over!

CONTROLS
  • ARROWS / WASD - Move / jump
  • ESCAPE - Pause
  • R - Restart level
  • F - Switch Fullscreen (desktop only)
  • X - Quit (desktop only)
